text: Chlorpromazine, also known by its trade name Thorazine, is an antipsychotic drug. It is typically made to treat Schizophrenia, and treat bipolar disorder in the past. It has been shown to help uncontrollable hiccups disappear. It is also used to help with nausea and vomiting. Chlorpromazine was developed in 1950, making it the oldest antipsychotic drug. ==References== Category:Drugs used in psychiatry Category:Organochlorides Category:Organonitrogen compounds Category:Organosulfur compounds
title: Chlorpromazine
